channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Gaining speed on tokenization is vital for UK’s financial future, banking group warns
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: UK Finance says it’s not too late for the United Kingdom to make up for other jurisdictions’ faster start to securities tokenization, and the country better do it if it wants to remain a global financial leader.

item.title: UK Law Commission report challenges Craig Wright's suit against Bitcoin developers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: A report published by the UK Law Commission bolsters Bitcoin core developers' defense that they are not liable for 111,000 BTC taken by hackers.

item.title: Bitcoin mining stocks outperform BTC in 2023, but on-chain data points to a potential stall
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Bitcoin mining stocks have been on a triple-digit tear in 2023, but an uptick in BTC sent to exchanges hints at waning momentum.

item.title: Binance refers users to Coinmerce as exchange exits the Netherlands
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: A reported hundreds of thousands of users based in the Netherlands will have the opportunity to move their assets to Coinmerce for free as Binance winds down operations.

item.title: Scientists created a crypto portfolio management AI trained with on-chain data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: According to the researchers, CryptoRLPM is the first reinforcement learning-based AI system using on-chain metrics for portfolio management.

item.title: Buckle up, Reddit: Closed APIs cost more than you’d expect
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rick Porter
item.description: Open APIs are vital for healthy communities on social platforms. With Web2 companies beginning to reject that principle, Web3 could be poised to supplant them.

item.title: Bitcoin forks BCH, BSV and XEC soared last month, but are the gains organic and sustainable?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Bitcoin forks, BCH, BSV and XEC rallied over the last 30 days while KAS and FLEX led among altcoin gainers in June, but data questions the sustainability of their rallies.

item.title: NY Fed, banks wrap up regulated liabilities network proof-of-concept using wCBDC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The theoretical network would help the dollar maintain its status internationally with “game-changing” improvements in service.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried backed out of FTX sponsorship deal with Taylor Swift: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The report contradicts the narrative from many media outlets that Taylor Swift’s team had done its due diligence in considering the FTX deal before pulling out.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why is the crypto market down
is crypto in a bear market
when will bitcoin price go up
item.description: Bitcoin price quickly reversed course today after hitting a 2023 high. Cointelegraph investigates why.

item.title: US Homeland Security returns $314K from 2016 Bitfinex hack
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The funds were seized by U.S. Customs and Border Protection. Recovery efforts for the remaining funds are ongoing.

item.title: DeSo offers $1M bounty for building decentralized Reddit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Developers pointed out the “monopolization of content and data” in centralized social media platforms as a reason to create a decentralized alternative.

item.title: Elon Musk calls for AI regulatory oversight: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: In a keynote address at a Chinese government-backed AI conference, Musk noted that governments should be concerned about deep intelligence.

item.title: Is Web3 messaging going to replace WhatsApp and iMessage? Co-founder of XMTP explains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: The co-founder of XMTP, Shane Mac, is optimistic that Web3 messaging will play a critical role in bringing the masses to the industry.

item.title: Bittrex may still face enforcement action in Florida amid bankruptcy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: A filing in bankruptcy court from Florida's Office of Financial Regulation suggested the regulator still had the “administrative discretion” to charge Bittrex.

item.title: BTC price abruptly dips below $30K as Bitcoin daily candle turns sour
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls’ joy does not last long as new yearly highs get swapped out for a trip to new July lows.

item.title: 8 ways crypto mining companies can effectively embrace ESG practices
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Smart ESG practices can help crypto mining companies be more responsible members of the global community and attract new investors.

item.title: What is the ZK industry up to? Rollups, multichain bridges and VCs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: As an emerging technology, how can zero-knowledge proofs remedy many issues across the crypto space?

item.title: 4 reasons why the Ether price can’t break $1,970
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: The Ethereum network has faced withdrawals from its smart contract applications, putting the recent ETH price rally in check.

item.title: Mastercard AI-powered tool to help banks fight fraud
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Mastercard revealed a new AI-driven tool available to banks for collecting insights to predict scams and frauds involving real-time payments.

item.title: Animoca still bullish on blockchain games, awaits license for metaverse fund
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Animoca Brands co-founder Yat Siu expects a number of its blockchain gaming investments to come to market by the end of 2023.

item.title: Namibia passes bill to regulate crypto and digital assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The legislation aims to establish a framework for licensing and regulating virtual asset service providers.

item.title: What is Twitter’s rate limit, and can you bypass it?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Twitter’s rate limit helps maintain system stability and prevent abuse. Bypassing the rate limit is not possible and can result in temporary restrictions.

item.title: Ethereum NFT royalties hit 2-year low as Bored Ape floor price falls below 30 ETH
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: NFT royalties are an important gauge of incoming revenues to fund the ongoing development of various projects in the ecosystem.

item.title: Execs remain positive on long-term prospects amid VC funding downturn
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Outlier Ventures exec Gvantsa Chkuaseli said there are reasons to stay optimistic, and challenging conditions haven’t stamped out interest.

item.title: Binance to deactivate some deposit addresses for wallet upgrade
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Binance continues upgrading its wallet infrastructure, which requires affected users to get new wallet addresses.

item.title: Bitcoin hits new yearly highs as BTC price rebounds to $31.5K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls are stampeding past the top of the range, but there is already a risk that BTC price is forming a “predatory range.“

item.title: UAE emerges as a pro-Bitcoin mining destination in the Middle East
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The United Arab Emirates’ combined Bitcoin mining capacity is estimated to be around 400 megawatts or 4% of Bitcon’s global hash rate.

item.title: OpenAI creates a new team to tackle ‘superintelligent’ AI systems
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: OpenAI says it’s planning to create a team to help manage the risks that could come from a superintelligent AI system that it expects to arrive within the decade.
